byline.contributor: Reporting was contributed by Mike McIntire, Kitty Bennett, Sarah Cohen and Amy Chozick.
byline.original: By MAGGIE HABERMAN and STEVE EDER

abstract: Officials say Clinton Foundation increased its fund-raising in first half of 2015, even as organization came under scrutiny during initial period of Hillary Clinton's presidential campaign; say there are 10,516 donors to date in year, compared with 8,801 during year-ago period.
lead_paragraph: Clinton Foundation officials said Thursday that there were 10,516 donors so far this year, compared to 8,801 during the same six-month period last year.

headline.main: Spike in Donor Numbers for Clinton Foundation
headline.print_headline: Spike in Donor Numbers for Clinton Foundation

snippet: Clinton Foundation officials said Thursday that there were 10,516 donors so far this year, compared to 8,801 during the same six-month period last year.
